headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Honeywell International, 3M, Grupo, Cibest and ITT
summary: Honeywell and 3M stand out as diversified operators leaning on aerospace and defense strength to offset manufacturing and supply-chain headwinds.

headline: Trump's defense spending plans send 'strong' demand signal
summary: President Trump made waves in the defense industry on Thursday after stating via social media that he wants to raise 2027's military spending budget to $1.5 trillion while pushing for a cap on defense CEO pay packages. Gabelli Funds portfolio manager Tony Bancroft discusses what Trump's comments on production signal about defense demand amid various ongoing geopolitical conflicts, such as Ukraine's war with Russia and the recent US invasion of Venezuela. Bancroft manages the Gabelli Commercial Aerospace and Defense ETF (GCAD). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

content.title: Trump's defense spending plans send 'strong' demand signal
content.description:
President Trump made waves in the defense industry on Thursday after stating via social media that he wants to raise 2027's military spending budget to $1.5 trillion while pushing for a cap on defense CEO pay packages.

Gabelli Funds portfolio manager Tony Bancroft discusses what Trump's comments on production signal about defense demand amid various ongoing geopolitical conflicts, such as Ukraine's war with Russia and the recent US invasion of Venezuela.

Bancroft manages the Gabelli Commercial Aerospace and Defense ETF (GCAD).

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: Honeywell (HON) Target Trimmed as Mizuho Warns of Uneven Industry Backdrop
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is included among the 12 Best DOW Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 5, Mizuho analyst Brett Linzey lowered his price target on Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) to $240 from $250 and kept an Outperform rating. The changes came as Mizuho refreshed ratings and targets across the electrical equipment and […]
